title: ফ্যাক্ট চেক: চন্দ্রায়ণ-২ নিয়ে মমতার মন্তব্য নিয়ে বিভ্রান্তি ছড়াচ্ছে সোশ্যাল মিডিয়া পোস্ট
subtitle: DailyO.in Bangla is an online opinion and commentary platform which provides current affairs news and informative & in depth articles on politics, sports, lifestyle, science and technology, money, humour,art and architecture.

vclaim: We are proud of our scientists. The @isro team worked hard for #Chandrayaan2 . A befitting tribute to our founding fathers who envisioned India’s place in the league of scientifically advanced nations far ahead of their times. (1/2)
